channel.title: Cannot log into CLIENT (sorry i post it here)[508]
channel.description:
To begin i saw no response to my help request in the client help section and thought this section is more popular so i posted this error here... :|
when i try to load any clients run.bat file it says (this is 508) :
java not recognized as a inner or outer command, blah blah or blah. press any button to continue...
How to fix this??

[quote=“jc22493, post:3, topic:276609”]Configure your environmental variables.[/quote][quote=“laveerre, post:5, topic:276609”]What should i put there??please tell i wanna quit 317’s!!(is it the same stuff as in 317’s and is it different on vista or sumthin’?)

THANK YOU SO MUCH![/quote]
Your environmental variables do not change.
